briefTitle: Avon Foundation Program to Improve Quality of Life in Breast Cancer Survivors
officialTitle: Contemplative Self-Healing to Improve Quality of Life in Breast Cancer Survivors: the Avon Foundation Program to Reach Medically Underserved Populations
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Quality of life will be assessed by within patient differences in the FACT-G (General Functional Assessment of Cancer Treatment Scale), as well as with the disease specific subscales at baseline and at 12 months.
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

All women with stage I-III breast cancer who have received treatment within the preceding year will be eligible for inclusion in the study.

Exclusion Criteria:

1. Patients who refuse to participate will be excluded
2. Patients with metastatic (stage IV) cancer are excluded.
